lender.name: Ellen & Jillian
lender.loan_because: it's a buzz to help others

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: My parents owned a variety of small businesses and would have never been able to start their dreams rolling without loans from family and friends. I know we aren't all as lucky as they were.
lender.occupational_info: I sell men's grooming products in a small family owned company

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am a buisness owner myself and know the hardships of starting and running a business on a day to day basis. This is this a great way to enpower another business owner and the paybacks can be rolled over and over to help many more.
lender.occupational_info: I sell air pollution and water pollution control equipment to industrial customers

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can put off buying that new ski suit for another year!!
lender.occupational_info: I help people heal their illnesses and pains with mainly the use of my hands. I am interested in global health; both for the person and for the planet.

lender.name: Seekers, 1st Readers
lender.loan_because: The two groups wanted to donate money to a good cause and this one was recommended to us by a Church Member.
lender.occupational_info: First Friday Readers is the bookclub. A groups of women who get together once a month to discuss the chosen book. The Seekers Bible Study meets twice a month for Bible discussion.

lender.name: Tania & Samir
lender.loan_because: To promote trust and love across, political borders.
lender.occupational_info: She: (Pre-school teacher) Shapes the minds of young citizens at a very early age. He: (Engineer) Develops clean, alternative energy solutions for the world.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I'm Fortunate enough to have it to loan.
lender.occupational_info: Nothing comes without a price. Many need help to pay for it.

lender.name: Valorie
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the management of income and expenses at a marine terminal.

lender.name: Lorena
lender.loan_because: I feel it's better to enable someone to buy their own boat and fishing rod, than give them a single fish. It's an investment in the future of an individual, which flows through to their family, community, country, and eventually to the whole world.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: my life is rich from the gifts of others...and I want to share in the same way

lender.name: Penelope & Daniel
lender.loan_because: We want to help people, who don't have the advantages that we had starting out.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of thoes who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software used in medical devices.

lender.name: Allinee
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a faculty librarian at a community college on the West coast of the United States.
I absolutely love working there and I think I am extremely lucky; my students are awesome. They keep me on my toes, occasionally toss me a stumper, and never fail to challenge my assumptions–for which I am grateful. They teach me as much as I teach them, I’m sure of it.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: My friend was kind enough to give me a gift certificate, so that I could help other people. I will keep this loan going, and hopefully add more money to it in the future, for as long as this site exists. It's a really amazing idea.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime. - Chinese Proverb
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses with their computers.

lender.name: Sonia and Patrick
lender.loan_because: .....because we can

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It works...
lender.occupational_info: Paper pusher...

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I'm able to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student in Oregon and I plan to pursue foreign affairs and language when I go to college.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have a good job and a good place to live. I want others to have the same opportunities for a happy and satisfying life.
lender.occupational_info: I put together contracts with suppliers for services that my company needs.

lender.name: Kiva
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students at the University of Virginia who meet biweekly to loan and raise awareness of microfinance.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: The best gift in the world is the gift of opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full-time student majoring in finance, accounting and minoring in business law. I am also an intern at Baldwin where I help people with make money with their money. I also teach hip-hop dancing at a dancing studio.

lender.name: Sangee
lender.loan_because: it takes very little to do a lot.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: FEESABIALLAH.. I am just one man. But We (humanity) give so that others can recieve. Money is a great test in this life. So i hope that god can forgive us for where we are weak and reward us for where we are strong.
lender.occupational_info: Well firstly, i work at being a better person. Secondly i study Islam. alhumduallah. Thirdly I am studying to become an attorney..

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: It is fun. It helps people. It doesn't take a lot of money. As a loan gets paid back, I loan it out again. Just recycling the money.
lender.occupational_info: I get paid to do what people do every day all over the world. Manage time, money and people.

lender.name: Javier
lender.loan_because: I loan because I like to help entrepreneurs. As an entrepreneur myself I know how hard it is to do the first step. We all need financial, social and emotional help making the first step to financial freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I empowered people to fulfills their ultimate dreams.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: it's empowering!
lender.occupational_info: marketing

lender.name: sabine
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing the blessings
lender.occupational_info: I cook for a living

lender.name: Franco
lender.loan_because: we are mandated to serve!
lender.occupational_info: to ease the suffering of people

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It helps me feel like I've made some small difference.

lender.name: Harue
lender.loan_because: I feel a connection with the world.

lender.name: Jesi and Rick
lender.loan_because: I want my children to understand compassion. They choose the loans we make!
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: My contribution can make a difference.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.occupational_info: I work to raise money to fund an organization that empowers girls and women to make healthy choices.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Francois
lender.loan_because: It is a very good way to help those who are willing to go out of poverty. We know exactly how it will benefit them and I wish them the best of luck. A small loan is very little effort that can change people's life. Congrats to Kiva people ;-)

lender.name: Leeann
lender.loan_because: I am a builder of community and want to contribute to the expansion of hope beyond my backyard.
lender.occupational_info: I educate the employees that I work with so that they can do their jobs better.

lender.name: Chika
lender.loan_because: the money spent on beer could be better spent.
lender.occupational_info: I make people in magazines look better than they really are...and make sure they don't look green or red or any color in the printing.

lender.name: Stu
lender.loan_because: Inspired by faith.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computer projects for a health insurance company.

lender.name: Sublime Traveler
lender.loan_because: God gives us everything and asks nothing in return, except that we give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I sell surveillance and counter-surveillance equipment such as hidden cameras and electronic bug detectors.

lender.name: Cas
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help from our friends.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: It is exciting to help someone achieve financial independence. I travel often and this is a small way to say thanks for the many great experiences I've had around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I organise contemporary art exhibitions in a museum

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I know how important access to loans can be in enabling a business to succeed. Lending also gives me a chance to live my religious beliefs -- to value the inherent worth and dignity of all people, and to help others, both at home and throughout the world.

lender.name: Karma
lender.loan_because: I feel priveleged to have benefited from a great education and endless opportunities to support my entrepreneural dreams. I want to help provide opportunities for women less fortunate wherever possible. I spent several years living with my family in Lagos, Nigeria as a young child and I feel a connection to the people of Africa and want to do what I can to make their part of the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I have two careers that are quite different. Most of my income is from my work as a project manager in Corporate America. I am also a Massage therapist and I work to help clients who suffer from stress, chronic pain, and injuries. I keep busy with both jobs and I also have a 3 1/2 year old son who I adore.

lender.name: Briar
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I have been blessed and for this I want to give back to those less fortunate. We all have a debt to pay!

lender.name: Sammy
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel warm & fuzzy inside :)

lender.name: Alex Caudill
lender.loan_because: I've always had a ton of opportunities and I'd like to create some!
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs and create interactive websites for businesses

lender.name: Nuala
lender.loan_because: My experience as a working mother for almost 50 years (with six children and many grandchildren), is that people's creativity and energy is just waiting to be released. Kiva is one way to empower them.
lender.occupational_info: I design and manage building projects in Ireland.

lender.name: Katharina
lender.loan_because: I am impressed by the idea of making empowement of the poor more tangible through individualization and social capital.
lender.occupational_info: I try to get insights on how social entrepreneurs attract resources to catalyze the the creation of social value

lender.name: Ivana
lender.loan_because: we all need a help sometime, and we all can help sometime.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to have nice and relaxing time when they are staying in my town, in hotel where I work,even maybe help them forget about their problems at least when I am arround them :)

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that would otherwise not qualify or have help available.
lender.occupational_info: Business consulting and accounting services to small businesses and families.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a positive change in someones life.

lender.name: Dick - Stacey - Ryan
lender.loan_because: It gives us immense satisfaction helping someone achieve their goals and improve their life ...
lender.occupational_info: After many years of working for ourselves we want to help others achieve their dreams and financial independence.

lender.name: Anah
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kiva. I think that microfinancing is one of the best ways to address the massive imbalance in the global distribution of wealth and resources. I appreciate the non-judgmental nature of the lending process, and I am especially invested in the way that the borrowers decide what their needs are and take action on their own behalf. The autonomy and empowerment of the borrowers is so important to me. I think this is one of the best ways to help those who have fewer resources and options shape and direct their lives while gaining economic security and success.
lender.occupational_info: I write novels and short stories that are published either in books or for people to read on their computers.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because:
I want to.
Kiva has shown itself and its borrowers to be trustworthy and, to be honest, inspiring.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university supporting a supercomputer used to solve large problems such as protein folding, astrophysics, earthquakes and climate.

lender.name: Jonathan & Ceinwen
lender.loan_because: we believe that everyone should have the opportunity to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Jonathan works for a church in London and Ceinwen is a lawyer.

lender.name: Malini
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people with the resources they need to make a difference in their own livelihoods because it impacts them, their families and their communities.

lender.name: Carolina
lender.occupation: Owner of a Bed and Breakfast - North of Portugal
lender.loan_because: Kiva deserves...
lender.occupational_info:
It's an amazing experiency to know people all over the world.
World is ours, I want to do it better!

lender.name: Corbie
lender.loan_because: my entire life is about helping people cross the bridge from fear to fearlessness so that they can fly. Fear and poverty often go hand in hand -- self sufficiency gives wings!
lender.occupational_info: I guide people in their spiritual lives. It is all about knowing that God is there for you, however you view Him.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to be successful, and it's so rewarding to watch the progress that Kiva enables.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: We should all ask ourselves about the fortuitous nature of being able to loan to those in less fortunate circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I work on problems related to coastal land loss in Louisiana and green design in land use.

lender.name: Bettie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people see their dreams come true.

lender.name: Chrissy
lender.loan_because: the world is unjust, and we all need the opportunity to live the life we want to live.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students at an international school. These kids are usually the children of the embassy employees here in Guatemala. My students come from all over the world and I learn just as much about their culture as they learn about science from me.

lender.name: Lifai
lender.loan_because: I want to help: 1. People who want to do something good but are unable to because of something so small 2. Change the world for the better 3. Because I can not travel there and volunteer as much as I want to
lender.occupational_info: I provide business and technology services within a corporation.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: This is a small way to help out.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: To whom much has been given, much will be required.

lender.name: Yolana
lender.loan_because: A small offering can make a big change.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I am able to

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help sometime in our lives
lender.occupational_info: My Business was in the Canary. islands working with Tourists,and was very enjoyable.

lender.name: Rifki Afrigh
lender.loan_because: i lost my money, someone steal it,,, i need to pay my school,,, i really need in hurry,,, i'll give the money back as soon as possible,,, for someone who has a lot of money, please help me,,,, i need $3000,,, Thank you so much,,,

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in the lives of people in distant lands, whose struggles are so much more difficult than mine, by giving them a HAND UP as opposed to a handout, which often creates a temporary fix.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Helping each other is an easy way to make this world a better place - for us and more importantly for our children.
lender.occupational_info: My passion is baking food for people to enjoy and share together.

lender.name: Marcos Raùl Ramos
lender.occupation: Tecnico Superior y profesor. en Seg.y Med.Amb.Lab.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need that are trying to make their homes a better place to live. People that work hard for so little deserve help from those who have the means.
lender.occupational_info: I sell jewelry on the internet. People from all around the world are able to purchase from me!

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I like this program. It should replace the UN and most Governments Foreign Aid Progams
lender.occupational_info: Commercial Single-ply and photovoltaic roofs...I am the estimator

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I believe very strongly in the power of the entrepreneur and feel privileged to be able to help others improve their lives through micro-financing.

lender.name: Alister
lender.loan_because: I want to buy a small Land about 4000 acres to make a small Oil Palm Plantation and the price is USD250,000.00
lender.occupational_info: I need Help to get a Loan from Kiva across all over the World USD250000.00.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: My husband and I are both entrepreneurs but we are fortunate enough to live in a country that has given us so many opportunities, education and freedom. We want to extend a bit of that freedom to other entrepreneurs around the world
lender.occupational_info: I help leaders in organizations to learn the skills they need to manage themselves and their teams to perform their best.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: my mother raised me to believe that the world is a better place when women help other women.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international television news agency

lender.name: Rubicon South
lender.loan_because: The world just needs a little helping hand.

lender.name: Kudrat
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help out!

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I have been involved in development, and Micro loans for entrepreneurs, and found out about Kiva through word of mouth., and so far have been very impressed.
lender.occupational_info: I have been in management most of my life, in black Africa, India and Switzerland. Recently I was involved in a technological aspect of micro finance using mobile phones, as well as a consultant for "one up" in size on micro credit loaned to entrepreneurs in East Africa ( average size of loans around 10'000$.)

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I run a mental health clinic

lender.name: PB Middle School
lender.loan_because: We want to make our world a better place. Fighting poverty and supporting human ingenuity, community health projects, service to others and projects that make our environments healthier, safer and more peaceful are important to us at Pacific Beach Middle School.
lender.occupational_info: Builders Club is one of the many clubs at Pacific Beach Middle: An International Baccalaureate World School. Our club sponsors the loans for the school as part of our commitment to better local and global communities through service.

lender.name: Marin
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: marjorie and josie
lender.loan_because: we want to help people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: marjorie is a writer and josie is in first grade.

lender.name: brigitte
lender.loan_because: I am a single mum; I know how important it is for people to have an income. I am very lucky to live in a wealthy part of the world.

lender.name: Bobbi
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves through loans is, in my mind, better than giving to charity. I know that when I've been given money, I don't appreciate it as much as when I've worked to earn it. It means more when someone else has confidence in you to repay a loan, than when they give you money out of pity.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver the mail, it's a wonderful job because I get to be outside and most people are happy to see me :)

lender.name: Reto
lender.loan_because: it's a great idea for helping people to get sth going.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is my duty as a person born into the richest country in the world to help the less fortunate. No one can choose where they will come into the world and if you just happen to be born in Africa or South America you shouldn't have less rights or privileges than anyone else.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: As a Peace Corps volunteer in West Africa in the early 1980s I saw how much alike we all are as human beings and how much just a little help at the right time could improve people's lives. I love the idea of helping others directly without the intermediary of banks.
lender.occupational_info: My work is currently in transition! For the past 15 years I have worked as editor at the office of Arid Lands Studies at the University of Arizona. But, due to funding cuts I will be looking for new work soon. It's scary and exciting at the same time. Maybe some of you would like to look at the web site of the online journal I edited for the past 12 years, the Arid Lands Newsletter; the URL is below.

lender.name: Emma Cowan
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other.

lender.name: Sawyer
lender.loan_because: I like helping people!

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to be able to assist others to realize the joy and freedom that comes from being able to sustain a decent lifestyle for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology in Healthcare. And I draw and paint as often as I can.

lender.name: Elsbeth
lender.loan_because: I believe I have a responsibility to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make art, keep honeybees and hens, grow organic food and teach

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: Microfinance. What an extraordinary idea to allow people to take a very small amount of money and use it over and over to help people worldwide make a better life for themselves and their families. I hope to be able to make a positive difference in people's lives, a little at a time, all around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in IT at one of the studios in "Hollywood" where we produce and sell movies and television programs globally. I am extraordinarily lucky to have all that I have in this world and want to help others, especially female entrepreneurs, get ahead.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help jump start people who just need a small loan to get them going in their buisness.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I like to enable people to help themselves. Sometimes we all need a hand to get going.

lender.name: Nikhil
lender.loan_because: I want to create and open doors of opportunities like others did for me

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I organize volunteer activities for employees at my company. I also help to manage and distribute our company donations to the community.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has the right to a better life and that those who are trying shouldn't be penalized because of their place of birth.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student obtaining my Bachelor of Science degree in Public and Non Profit Administration.

lender.name: Dario
lender.loan_because: When I fist started my business it was very hard for me to get a loan to grow my business so I know how it feels to want to buy more inventory or equipment and not be able to get the money.
lender.occupational_info: I buy a product make it better and sell it for a huge profit

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Have and give.
lender.occupational_info: I teacher grade nine (all subjects) in a small rural town.

lender.name: Jacquie
lender.loan_because: people need help to get their business growing and/or improve their lives. small amount of $$ makes a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an online retailer

lender.name: Jacqui & Donna
lender.loan_because: Because it only takes one person to change the world
lender.occupational_info: Jacqui plays in a rock band and works cutting lawns and doing gardening during the day. Donna works helping unemployed people find sustainable work. On the weekends we are learning to paint.

lender.name: EDUCATE Roots&Shoots
lender.occupation: Homeschoolers from the Greater Kansas City Area
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I am honored to be able to give back by investing in someone's future.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Executive Director of a nonprofit that is working to ensure access to legal assistance for low-income families, children, and persons with disabilities.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: The US economy was founded by entrepreneurs. People are inspired to take risks, to grow, to fail and succeed, to learn, so often it only takes a little bit to help some one get started. Thanks, Donna for showing me Kiva. The folks who believed in me Peter, Virginia, Fips, Pomfret & Brown University
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional money manager. People hire me to watch over and grow the money they have saved for investments.

lender.name: Epiphany
lender.loan_because: I feel like it! Helping others makes me feel all warm and toasty inside, but I'm kind of broke. It's great that after a loan is repaid, it can be disbursed to someone else... and in this way, the borrowers kind of help one another. A small amount can go a long way. Also, honestly, I otherwise would probably be wasting my money on unnecessary crap on eBay if it weren't for these cool Kiva people..
lender.occupational_info: I'm a university student, which consists of studying a lot, walking or biking everywhere, and (obviously) playing a lot of Tetris.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: It is my privilege to share my good fortunes with those who struggle daily to make ends meet.
lender.occupational_info: My job consists of very physically demanding work and at times high amounts of stress and uncertainty. However,at the end of the day I have a clear conscience and a deep feeling of satisfaction.

lender.name: Bridgett
lender.loan_because: so many people in the world already have the spirit but just need the start.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in sociology.

lender.name: Missy
lender.loan_because: I CARE
lender.occupational_info: Nursing is an International profession.

lender.name: miles
lender.loan_because: I have been all over the world and mostly to developing countries and I´ve seen the hard working people who can use a break to get ahead in this world
lender.occupational_info: I am a pro athlete that happens to be on skis. I ski for photographers and they get the photos published in magazines. I am also a mountain guide and I take clients to the top of mountains all over the world including Mt. Mckinley, Aconcagua, Kilimajaro and more.

lender.name: Eva Marie
lender.loan_because: It makes so much sense and combining the efforts of like minded people means that we can make a meaningful difference in lives, one by one
lender.occupational_info: I help people who manage other people's money do the right thing for their investors

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: People have helped me in the past, now I want to return the favor. Pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I'm married 19 years, with two great kids (even though they're teenagers!) I design logos for the local kayak guide to catalogs for the Metropolitan Opera and annual reports for companies like Foot Locker and Research in Motion.

lender.name: Bek
lender.loan_because: My friend gave me a gift certificate for my birthday, but also I love this idea. I think it's fantastic to be helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a University and my role is to assist in the development and implimentation of Flexible Learning. Which basically means a different way of getting information to students - not just face to face.

lender.name: soundbyte
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business with nothing, and I appreciate the drive and ambition that these business people must have to overcome such amazing odds.
lender.occupational_info: I own a number of diverse businesses, including soundbyte -- a computer & musical instrument retail store.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to share what God has blessed me with.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an ambulance to help people who are hurt in their homes or on the street

lender.name: shannon
lender.loan_because: My friend gave me a gift certificate. But after reading everybody's stories, I will add more money of my own!
lender.occupational_info: I write for magazines and travel guides.

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: I laze around the house and sleep approximately 23 hours a day. The other hour I spend being a pest and annoying people.

lender.name: Chad & Melissa Wiebesick
lender.occupation: Chad is a marketer and Melissa is a social worker.
lender.loan_because:
Chad and Melissa Wiebesick are both social activists. They want to lend a helping hand in making the world a greater place. Kiva makes it a greater place. Using Kiva to lend to the world's working poor makes a lasting change. And a tangible change. They'd rather lend money to people who need it than have it sit in their bank.
They enjoy visiting other countries and have travelled to Belize, Bahamas, Cayman Islands, Honduras, and Mexico (Ensenada and Cozumel). Chad has lived in nearly half the world's continents. He's been an expatriate twice -- living four years in Germany and five years in South Korea. He’s an avid globetrotter and has visited Austria, Belgium, Berlin (East and West), Canada, Denmark, England, France, Holland, Italy, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and Russia (Moscow and Leningrad). He still hasn't satiated his wanderlust.
lender.occupational_info: Chad works in advertising. He helps companies promote their products. Melissa is a social worker. She helps people in need and solves social problems.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. We are all part of the same family, and family should help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I help to improve the level of service offered to our customers.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I feel so incredibly fortunate in my life that I've been able to follow my own path, mostly undeterred. A lot of that has to do with the passion I have for what I do, but also because of the sacrifices made by friends and family alike who have shown me nothing but support and love. Every chance to give back to the world is a chance that must be taken.
lender.occupational_info: Basically, music is every capacity.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I care about people all around the world and I never want to take my blessings for granted. I believe to whom much is given, much is also required, and I give to the glory of God.
lender.occupational_info: I am a journalist. I travel to take photos and write stories about things that are going on around the world, so I have seen some interesting countries and met wonderful people.

lender.name: Laimi
lender.loan_because: i want to start buying closthes from South AFrica and sell in my country.. i look after amm my sibblings and its not easy with the salary i earn.
lender.occupational_info: im a personal assistnat tot he CEO and i help vulnerable kids in the street

lender.name: James and JoAnne
lender.loan_because: To help those who need is what God wants from each of us.
lender.occupational_info: James advises businesses on security matters. JoAnne has a small antique business

lender.name: Mobilee
lender.loan_because: We are a consultancy firm in The Netherlands. We are happy to share a part of our profits with entrepeneurs in other countries. We hope that some of our contributions will lead to a better life for entrepeneurs and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Consultancy, project management, interim management.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: The amount of my loan is small to me but it makes a huge difference to someone else. I admire those who can take charge of their own life and if I can help someone to do that, then it gives me great pleasure.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a part time Masters student and part time homemaker since moving to the US last year.

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because: as a banker, I understand the significance of credit. I much prefer loaning money to people in need to just plain giving it to them. This to me is a question of human dignity, but it does not prevent me from giving to charitable purposes additionally.

lender.name: Jefficus
lender.loan_because: Helping people to do something to help themselves seems so much more useful than just giving money to old-fashioned organizations and hoping they use it wisely.
lender.occupational_info: I invent new ways for computers to help people be more creative and expressive.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.occupational_info: http://pedropolonio.fotopic.net http://club-silencio.blogspot.com http://myspace.com/pedropolonio

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world. I may not be rich but I can give on some level and this setting allows that to happen. My goal is to spread the word and share the fun.
lender.occupational_info: I am a residential supervisor for a facility that intakes children that have been removed from their families homes and are awaiting a semi-permanent placement.

lender.name: Yolanda
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: They really really need it.

lender.name: Ashlie
lender.loan_because: my boyfriend gave me a kiva credit for my birthday when we first started dating!
lender.occupational_info: i sell medicines to doctors who specialize in psychiatry and pain management.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I would like to make the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: I make the lives of our two dogs, Gabee and Baxter, happy in every way!

lender.name: Mike McGraw
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Christoph Marloh
lender.loan_because:
A Happy New Year and lots of harmony and success to you!
Love and concern for all are not things some of us are born with and others are not. Rather, they are results of what we do with our minds: We can choose to transform our minds so that they embody love, or we can allow them to develop habits and false concepts of separation.
From: 'Loving-Kindness - The Revolutionary Art of Happiness' Sharon Salzberg p89
lender.occupational_info: Vision to value. Details: http://www.gb24fonds.com/html/grundbesitz24/management.html

lender.name: Craig
lender.occupational_info: Commercial Insurance

lender.name: Justice
lender.loan_because: I want to increase the items that I sell in my Bar
lender.occupational_info: I have a small drinking bar where I sell soft drinks and wine.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: fortunately, I have the means to do so. It feels great to help others realize their goals.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I loan because Kiva fosters the needs of those seeking financial assistance, alongside those who are willing and able to provide it. It's a simple concept, yet far reaching, and I believe in helping those who are attempting to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I co-own a private equity firm (InvestAC, LLC) that is focused on providing capital for unique and alternative investment opportunities, with an emphasis in real estate and undervalued companies. My company's mission is to deliver superior returns to investors with mitigated risk through premier access to top investment opportunities, by way of a proven investment strategy and disciplined process.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I had read about microlending previously, but never thought about getting involved until a friend showed me the kiva site. I like the fact that I can help people around the world grow their businesses and make better lives for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: it is an easy and immediate way to make a difference.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: It's impossible to really improve our situations without the ability to borrow money. I've been given the chance; now it's my pleasure to help others have an opportunity.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to be a lender! I love the idea of being able to help other women start and maintain their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in and manage residential property. I own 20 apartments in the Washington, DC area.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stroke survivor who wants to help someone in need. I heard about your need in BIll Clinton's book and on TV. I hope my contribution can help.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it's interesting, fun and helps people

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am in a position to help others now.
lender.occupational_info: I have been teaching 3 and 4 year olds in international schools around the world.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I have always believed in enabling people to better themselves. In my view, life isn't about where you end up, but rather what you did to get there.

lender.name: Arne
lender.loan_because: It probably helps..

lender.name: Jean-Francois Noel
lender.occupational_info: Creating website. Like this hotel booking site http://www.seeyourhotel.com. The easiest way to see where you'll stay.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We are all a part of the Whole ; not to loan is like depriving a part of one's own family of their share of what we have.
lender.occupational_info: Working internationally via computer and telephone links.

lender.name: Almira
lender.occupation: Retired, volunteer children\'s story reader, yoga t

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I love uniting with people across the globe in funding the future of someone less fortunate than myself. I believe in making a small ripple that can affect many.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: The idea started as one of my Lenten activities but now I feel inspired by how it helps people improve their own lives. Also, it's a loan that keeps on lending and that is so cool!

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a small business and want to help others.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an amazing way to by-pass all the governments and government agencies. It's people to to people assistance at it's finest.

lender.name: Nyla
lender.loan_because: It is kind.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 21/2 year old girl. My sister helps me choose people to donate to.

lender.name: seOverflow
lender.loan_because: because I want others to be able to achieve their business goals

lender.name: anahi
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who have less then you. I believe in people who want a better way of life and fulfilling their dreams and their families dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Financial organization in the Community department. We run a peer lending program which I am involved in and support.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is the best way to achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: For years I practiced anesthesia (I put patients to sleep for surgery) but I am now mostly retired. I recently traveled to Tanzania to help teach health care professionals about Palliative Care. I learned as much from the participants as they did from the "teachers".

lender.name: Clint
lender.loan_because: After all that is said and done, what will matter to us before we die is the impact we had on others.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: No one can be free until everyone is free

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I'm really interested in other cultures and the way people live and I know that it's not that easy for people in other countires to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I go to high school in a one room school house with 8 other kids, so I know what it's like to live in a rural environment.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: a small donation can make a BIG difference in the life of an entrepreneur! Its an AWESOME concept!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am all ready the person my friends come to for money, so why not add a few more people I don't know to the list.
lender.occupational_info: do you watch video on-line? I built tools to make that stuff work.

lender.name: Kim Noland Rubber Nation
lender.loan_because: This is a beautifully simple way to impact lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother who started my own business 13 years ago. Now I hire other mothers to help me. I get to spend time with my children and work at what I love. My favorite days are every day. We sell beads and craft supplies from around the world.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Source, setup and support software for small businesses.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I believe that to better the world we must give everyone a fair shot at supporting themselves and their societies. I hope some day to be helping those people more directly, but for now, I am more than happy to lend as much as I can. Best wishes to all!

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I have so much compared to how little so many other women in the world have. I want to share what I have and help women prosper in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I retired in August 2007 as a consultant for the largest benefits consulting firm in the world, Mercer. My work there was very rewarding and now I have the opportunity for others to have the same experience.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I love helping others. I want to thank Kiva for giving me this opportunity to give a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I write at a computer, seven hours a day. I have to analyze situations and write about them.

lender.name: Donna and Juliet
lender.loan_because: I want my children to understand the positive impact that a single person can have on the world.

lender.name: Werner
lender.loan_because: it is something small for me, but it may make a big difference in some other people's life.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in obtaining their Australian internationally recognized qualifications based on their work experience.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I've been given so much.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I love to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I support technology for people so that they can do their jobs.

lender.name: Edvard
lender.loan_because: I like to contribute so people can take advantage of their opportunities.

lender.name: David & Laura
lender.loan_because: we can share our lives with other people in the world
lender.occupational_info: I make movies about packaging machines.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: People are worse off than me and need help.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am enjoying being retired.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together...what goes around, comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I try to bring computers and people together ;-) ...

lender.name: omer and rachel
lender.loan_because: it seems worthwhile.

lender.name: Karin & Mike
lender.loan_because: Each of us CAN make a difference.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I believe in individual responsibility and the free market. Capitalism has lifted billions out of poverty.

lender.name: Della
lender.loan_because: I can, and no one should be denied the help they need.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a passenger ferry, in the food services, I also provide first aid to passengers and crew.

lender.name: Matt & Patti
lender.loan_because: We can, and it is a pleasure to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Kaia
lender.loan_because: People have to get started somehow. If you have a dream, you deserve a chance to realize it.
lender.occupational_info: Human Resources, IT, Operations, Logistics, Accounts Receivables and Accounts Payables.

lender.name: Niki
lender.loan_because: I want to give people direct access to funds to promote their well-being.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze environmental issues for large public infrastructure projects (roads, bridges, ports, parks) and document them in reports so that the public knows the environmental impacts associated with the project.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: My wife and I believe in giving people an opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student, working part time while going to school.

lender.name: Fabio
lender.loan_because: I know by experience how difficult things can be when you want to have a better live for yourself or your family and you know that you have the talet and you know in your soul that you can work hard to pursue it but at the same time you cannot find anyone to trust in you, to believe in you......sometimes people just need a little hand to stand up and change their lives and through Kiva i think this is my chance to give a hand to this people and hopefuly make their lives better.

lender.name: jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I am able to at the time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a residential housekeeper.

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: Sharing feels right. I work hard and it feels good to know that I am appreciated and successful. I want to help others work hard and achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: I help my patients manage their pain and disability.

lender.name: MR WEEKS
lender.loan_because: i want my students to appreciate the power of giving.
lender.occupational_info: a labor of love

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.occupational_info: I make small clay teddy bears.

lender.name: Reece
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the ability to give to people who are in need. If i can help someone, i will.
lender.occupational_info: I make advertisements

lender.name: Dr. Anthony W. Antolic
lender.loan_because: I feel it is a great way to give back to God's people. I don't believe in tithing to a church, on account of the corruption I have seen with in the churches I have visited. However, the people of God's kingdom still need to be tended too.
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories to children, and I draw pictures to help tell those stories. I feel the best story ever told is the one not yet written.

lender.name: Ejay
lender.loan_because: I want my brothers and sisters in Africa to be successful
lender.occupational_info: I am a business student

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have tried investing in big business. I am very unhappy with it.
lender.occupational_info: Once I had thirty different jobs in one year!

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of getting the opportunity to help someone out.

lender.name: Twila
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a positive change in other people's lives.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I feel everybody can be successful with hard work and a little financial assistance.

lender.name: pushparaj
lender.loan_because: i need maoney for my medication i m alone n handicapted so plz lone men i need 1000$for itu can give this to my paypal acc
lender.occupational_info: i do any kind of work for living help me

lender.name: Rhonda Joy
lender.loan_because: it makes my heart smile :)
lender.occupational_info: I am incredibly blessed...From my heart to yours; share the love and blessings!

lender.name: Raghav
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance. I have been blessed enough that I have most of the things I need and in a position to help others. I feel that if most of the people out there are given a chance and resources they require, they would do a much better job than what I'm doing and would be able to chnage the world and make this place a much better one then what it is today..
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full time student doing my MSc in Insurance & Risk Management from Cass business School. I also work as an Intern for "Safeonline" a Lloyds Broker in London.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: while im saving up to buy a house or car, my money is just sitting in the bank. the small amount of interest i give up to microlend is worth far less to me than empowering people this way.
lender.occupational_info: Commerce student.

lender.name: Gabriela
lender.loan_because: The future of our society depends on what we do in the present.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I know the challenges facing people in rural areas and I like innovative ways of reaching between people. This is a way for me to see the impact on one individual, which isn't always so obvious with entire projects.
lender.occupational_info: I manage programs for a NGO that implements health projects in northern Vietnam (Cao Bang Province).

lender.name: Mez & Lisa
lender.loan_because: We love to share what we have, to give others a chance to have the life we have!
lender.occupational_info: A work in progress, always!

lender.name: Oceans of Opportunity
lender.loan_because: Working in some of the most remote corners of the planet, I have a selfless appreciation for the numerous hardworking individuals and families that are not reached by westernized resources, including access to capital. I believe that it is a our social responsibility, as visitors, environmentalists, and explorers of these areas to support the local economies and developing infrastructure by any means possible. The investment potential of these areas provides opportunities at a microscale which is often not realistic in more developed economies, yet is no less profitable; all while doing good for communities and economies in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am an environmental, ocean, and exploration advocate undertaking numerous microventures to develop our grassroots organization, Ocean Opportunity.

lender.name: Tammie
lender.loan_because: I want to change the difficult situation of others.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with the opportunity to help. This idea is simply fantastic
lender.occupational_info: I'm blessed with an exciting job as police officer, meeting all kind of people every day. I work and travel abroad as often as possible. I like to keep myself updated about what's going on in this rough World.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I've worked on remittances and microfinance for years in multilateral institutions and I think it is amazing to also be able to loan directly.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I hope to help make the world a better place - but not just for myself! Being self-employed, I know how useful even the smallest help can be.

lender.name: The Mother of Chili
lender.loan_because: I give a shit.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am prepared help people who are prepared to help themselves.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in life and would like to help others.

lender.name: Paul and Janis
lender.loan_because: We hope to make a positive impact on the lives of others. Jesus Christ loves all of us unconditionally, and calls us to love one another in the same way. We hope this loan shows that we care about you and want you to succeed. God Bless!

lender.name: Sarah Weaver
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Joline
lender.loan_because: It is the most affordable way I can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Fourth year of my Bachelor of Social Work

lender.name: julia
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference, and its important to do so when I can. When people stand up to make their lives better, I am proud to offer what support I have available
lender.occupational_info: Quality Assurance is the job of making sure people provide help and assistance to our customers,

lender.name: Marjie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I write and design books.

lender.name: Quia
lender.loan_because: I was a giving and loving person in life and now my friends will keep on giving in my memory.

lender.name: MrsHapaPake
lender.loan_because: I "Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege."

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I understand how important credit can be to small business owners and I want to give them the chance to grow and improve their businesses in order to provide income for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work together with clients in New York City to provide them with small business loans to help develop and/or grow their businesses. My job is to lend money exactly as Kiva partners do, but in the New York City area.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I wish to give back a little of that which I have received in this world. My family has begun a holiday tradition of donating funds in our names rather than receiving other gifts among ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a physician with patients in a hospital.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to get ahead.
